Distributed Real Time Data Acquistion Toolkit (DRDAT) Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
AlarmRefreshThis broadcast receiver turns on the periodic task that checks to see if we need bug the participant to do something
BootRestartBroadcast receiver that is woken up when the phone initially boots
DrdatCommunicationsMain entry point for manually managing tasks, schedules and data uploads Uses a ListView with entries in strings.xml
DrdatData2SmiThis takes care of uploading data from the phone to smi
DrdatData2Smi.UploadThread
DrdatDataProviderContent provider that gives access to participant generated data
DrdatFormCacheDoes the job of taking form html snippets and turning them into actual web pages that can be displayed by a web view
DrdatFormCollectorActs as an interface to the web form data
DrdatFormCollector.DBHelperPrivate class that provides an interface for working with SQLiteDatabase objects
DrdatFormsDisplays a form
DrdatForms.MyWebChromeClientProvides a hook for calling "alert" from javascript
DrdatHelpDisplay the users guide to DRDAT
DrdatListTasksActivity class that uses a WebView component which lets us select a task we want to do
DrdatListTasks.JavascriptInterfaceClass that lets us retrieve the study_id and task_id from the selection form
DrdatLoginWhat the drdat gui app uses to get cached login information
DrdatLoginCacheManage email / password pairs
DrdatLoginCache.DBHelper
DrdatLoginExceptionComplain if we get bad login data
DrdatSettingsSettings editor for drdat
DrdatShowScheduleMakes a dynamic list view of the schedule for a given participant
DrdatSmi2TaskUse the smi to get the forms for a specific task
DrdatSmi2Task.DBHelperFrom the notepad tutorial - interface to our form db
DrdatSmi2Task.FormDataContainer for our query data
DrdatSmi2TaskListThis is the workhorse object that manages task scheduling
DrdatSmi2TaskList.DBHelperFrom the notepad tutorial - interface to our task and scheduling db
DrdatSmi2TaskListExceptionComplains if you are trying to update a list of tasks without an email / password pair
DrdatTaskContent provider that returns the forms for a specific task
DrdatTasklistContent provider that wraps DrdatSmi2TaskList so DrdatGUI can get tasks and schedules
DrdatUpdateSchedulePresents a login form so that a participant can make a web query to the smi to update their task list and reminder schedule
LoginUses DrdatCL's DrdatLogin content provider interface to check and cache log in info
PartLoginLog in form for participants
PasswordEncoderUtility to make md5 hashes with a string input
SmiProvide access to the SMI url
StudyContainer class for a study
TaskContainer class that keeps data for a specific task
TaskBroadcastThis BroadcastReceiver gets triggered from DrdatCL's AlarmRefresh if there is a task that is scheduled
Generated on Mon May 10 04:02:41 2010 for Distributed Real Time Data Acquistion Toolkit (DRDAT) by  1.4.7
